Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Following the route Liv has mapped out, you run into a distorted Program Ghost.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'How come... But the signal characteristics on it are definitely identical to "Bianca"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "They're probably left behind by the springboard.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It is distorting because "Bianca" couldn\'t clean up the messy departure of her invading data in time... Or maybe she never intended to clean it up for the host she hijacked.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is probably going to affect the efficiency of our tactics, but I think we should fix it.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I would have done the same myself. If we extract the noises from the Program Ghost, we should theoretically be able to figure out the direction of the bridging route.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Program Ghost', 3: 'Information received... Verification completed. Program Code 90943 is now returning to work routine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's a Program Ghost after all. You can't expect it to behave in the same way as an AI.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We did help it, and that's enough.", 4: '3'}
